readable.title: 2894850774_2d530040a1
readable.content: Two elderly women can be seen from a car talking next to a wall . Two gray-haired women holding bags talk on the sidewalk near a road . Two older women conversing near a wall as seen from the driver 's seat of a parked vehicle . Two older women stand outdoors with their bags and talk . Two women carrying bags stand outside next to a wall .
